description: This file defines the OpenBBTools class, a toolkit for interacting with the OpenBB financial data platform. It includes methods for fetching stock prices, company symbols, price targets, news, and profiles, utilizing the openbb library and integrating with a larger toolkit framework.

classes.name: OpenBBTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with the OpenBB financial data platform, providing methods for stock data retrieval, company search, news, and profiles.

methods.name: get_stock_price
methods.description: Fetches the current stock price and related data for a given symbol or list of symbols.

methods.name: search_company_symbol
methods.description: Searches for ticker symbols based on a company name.

methods.name: get_price_targets
methods.description: Retrieves consensus price targets and recommendations for a given stock symbol.

methods.name: get_company_news
methods.description: Fetches recent news stories related to a stock symbol.

methods.name: get_company_profile
methods.description: Retrieves the company profile and overview for a given stock symbol.
